悀字的基本解释

悀
yǒng
满溢，涌出。
愤怒。
欢喜。

悀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǒng］
［《廣韻》余隴切，上腫，以。］
亦作“愑1”。亦作“愹1”。
(1)盛器内装满而溢出。
(2)忿懑，愤怒。
(3)欣喜。

悀字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　悀； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页386第19
【廣韻】余隴切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】尹竦切，?音勇。【玉篇】怒也。忿也。　又【廣韻】心喜也。　又【集韻】凡以器盛而滿謂之悀。或从勇从容。

悀字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
悀字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Shocked
yǒng
Overflowing, gushing out.
anger.
joy.
Shocked
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǒng］
["Guangyun" Yu Long cut, swollen on the top, to. ]
Also known as "stun 1". Also known as "愹1".
(1) The container is full and overflows.
(2) Feeling sorrowful and angry.
(3) Rejoicing.

[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　悀; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 386 Page 19
[Guangyun] Yu Longqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Yin Yuqie,? Yinyong. [Jade articles] Anger too. Annoyed too.　[Guangyun] Xinxi also.　 [Jiyun] Everyone who is full of utensils is full of frustration. Or courageously and calmly.
